name: Iain Ray
about: Honors Finance student at the University of Kentucky. Experienced in leadership, safety, and public relations through my role as a lifeguard and swim mentor. I am actively involved on campus as the activities chair for UK Club Running and a member of Sigma Nu fraternity.

experience.title: Lifeguard
experience.description: Ensures the safety of patrons through leadership in safety and prevention. Conducts swim lessons and collaborates with a team to perform life-saving operations when necessary.

activities: Activities Chair for UK Club Running
